basic.Target Organism: [Ref.23893489] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus(MBC=3.71 μg/ml, 1.83 μM), MRSA(MBC=2.25 μg/ml, 1.11 μM), Streptococcus agalactiae(MBC>100 μg/ml, 55 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MBC=4.35 μg/ml, 2.14 μM), Escherichia coli(MBC=1.79 μg/ml, 0.88 μM), Salmonella enteritidis(MBC=10.41 μg/ml, 5.13 μM), Stenotrophomonas maltophilia(MBC=7.00 μg/ml, 3.45 μM)
